Gem pouch
Type: Container

A small pouch filled with precious gems. You can feel the weight of the gems as you hold it.

Gem pouch is an openable treasury item. It can be found by completing various activities. They can have the odds of finding them increased with the Chest Finding equipment attribute.

Loot Tables

These are the sub-tables for the various materials, coins, and items that can come from these chests.

These treasury items take 4 independent loot rolls when they are opened.

Main Loot Table

Rough ethernite 1 0.498% 1.977% ~1 in 51 67 (67)

‡W.E.A.R is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.
